key_commands.description: List all pods in the test-hotel-reservation namespace to quickly identify the failing pod (user) with RunContainerError.

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl describe pod user-<POD_SUFFIX> -n test-hotel-reservation; echo '---LOGS (current)---'; kubectl logs user-66d5<POD_SUFFIX>test-hotel-reservation --all-containers=true; echo '---LOGS (previous)---'; kubectl logs user-66d5d6f8<POD_SUFFIX>-hotel-reservation --all-containers=true -<REPLICA_SUFFIX>")
key_commands.description: Describe the failing pod and retrieve current and previous logs to diagnose the CrashLoopBackOff and identify the root cause (executable not found).
key_commands.original_command: exec_shell("kubectl describe pod user-66d5d6f874-slrgw -n test-hotel-reservation; echo '---LOGS (current)---'; kubectl logs user-66d5d6f874-slrgw -n test-hotel-reservation --all-containers=true; echo '---LOGS (previous)---'; kubectl logs user-66d5d6f874-slrgw -n test-hotel-reservation --all-containers=true --previous")
